(Simplified: 骀)
Chinese Definition:
①劣馬，亦喻庸才：駑駘。羸駘。
②馬銜脫落：“馬駘其銜，四牡橫奔”。

駘字的基本解释

駘
tái

駘
dài
均见“骀”。

駘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tái］
［《廣韻》徒哀切，平咍，定。］
“骀1”的繁体字。
(1)马嚼子脱落。
(2)指劣马。常喻庸才。
(3)践踏。参见“駘藉”。
(4)见“駘佗”。
(5)用同“鮐”。参见“駘背”。
[②]［dài］
［《廣韻》徒亥切，上海，定。］
“骀2”的繁体字。
(1)无所局限；舒缓广大。
(2)疲钝。
[③]［tāi］
［《集韻》湯來切，平咍，透。］
“骀3”的繁体字。

駘字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駘； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1436第16
【唐韻】徒哀切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】堂來切，?音臺。【玉篇】駑馬銜脫也。【崔寔政論】馬駘其銜。　又駘蕩，曠遠也。　又地名。【左傳·昭九年】魏駘芮岐畢吾西土也。【註】駘在始平武功縣。又【哀六年】遷孺子於駘。【註】駘，齊邑。【釋文】他才反。又徒來反。　又神名。【韻會】金天氏子曰晞，生允格臺駘。又人名。【莊子·德充符】魯有兀者王駘。　又【五音集韻】土來切，音胎。義同。　又【廣韻】徒亥切【集韻】【正韻】蕩亥切，?音待。【玉篇】駘蕩，廣大意。　又【正字通】春色舒放曰駘蕩。　又【廣韻】疲也，鈍也。　又【類篇】駘騱，馬不進也。　又【莊子·德充符】衞有惡人焉，曰哀駘它。【音義】駘音殆。李云：哀駘，醜貌。它，其名也。　又與跆同。【史記·天官書】兵相駘籍。【前漢書】作跆。

考證：〔【左傳·昭九年】駘芮岐畢。〕　謹照原文駘上增魏字。〔【哀六年】遷儒子於駘。〕　謹照原文儒子改孺子。

tired
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tái］
["Guangyun" is only mournful, flat and fixed. ]
"骀1" in traditional characters.
(1) The horse bit falls off.
(2) Refers to inferior horses. Chang Yu mediocre.
(3) Trample. See "borrowing".
(4) See "Ti Tuo".
(5) Use the same as "mackerel". See "back".
[②]［dài］
["Guangyun" Tu Haiqie, Shanghai, Ding. ]
"骀2" in traditional characters.
(1) No limit; soothing the vastness.
(2) Sluggishness.
[③]［tāi］
["Ji Yun" Tang Lai cut, flat 咍, through. ]
"骀3" in traditional characters.
tired

【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　骀; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1436 Page 16
[Tang Yun] I’m sorry to cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Come to cut, on the sound platform. [Jade articles] The horse is also taken off. 【Cui Miao Political Theory】Ma Qi's title.　Dangling again, far away.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan · Zhao Jiu Nian] Wei Qi, Rui Qi and Bi Wu Xitu also. [Note] Ti is in Wugong County, Shiping. Also【Sixth year of mourning】Move the child to Yuqi. [Note] Qi, Qi Yi. 【Explanation】He just opposed. Again in vain.　Also the name of God. [Rhyme Club] The son of Jintian said Xi, who gave birth to Yungetai. Another name. [Zhuangzi·De Chong Fu] Lu Youwu, Wang Qi.　[Five-tone Jiyun] Soil to cut, sound fetus. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] Tu Hai cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Dang Hai cut, wait for the sound. 【Jade articles】Unruly, broad meaning.　[Zhengzitong] Spring is relaxed and said to be dangling.　[Guang Yun] You are tired and dull.　[Classes] Hurry up, even if the horse doesn’t enter.　[Zhuangzi·De Chong Fu] Wei Youyou the wicked man, said to mourn it. [Sound and Meaning] The sound is dying. Li Yun: Sad, ugly. Its name is also.　It is the same with Tae. 【Historical Records·Book of Heavenly Officials】Bingxiang's status. [Previous Hanshu] for tae.
